 2015-11292015-07-28,  CIC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisReappointment of ALBERT LO of Richmond, British Columbia, as Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, on a part-time basis, effective October 12, 2015.
